Articles.Content: Unless you mean some religious figure (in which case many would contend it doesn't really exist, but eh...) then you'll probably find some of us don't know him.
hmm is it Santa Claus?
No. And actually there a very low chance anyone here doesn't know him.

1) Squad?

2) Jebediah Kerman?

No, and no. You guys are overlooking parts of the riddle and are throwing out guesses. Look Into each line. EVery one is a pretty big clue. So if almost all the lines match a person, but one doesn't, it's not them. Every line is important. (EDIT: Except the last line. That one was just to get the rhyme.) Here it is again:

He is someone you all know,

His talent he always shows.

He can print if he wants to,

but only in the color blue.

He was a christmas present from years ago,

Do not search for him, for his whereabouts nobody knows.

You all look up to him, to his authority,

Sorry for my riddle's lack of complexity.

Who is he?
Chuck norris
Only i can't match christmas present to anybody!

No it's not chuck norris. And christmas present is one of the easier hints. the printing in the color blue thing requires a little digging. Let me know if you guys give up. And i think you'll just hate me when you know the answer.
Creator of 3D printers? I don't know
Bill Gates or Steve Jobs?
hmm uhh dong i can't remember what is was called but is it like the old giant talking paperclip help tool thing that some of us may have had on our old computers? God its been too long.
No, no, and no. Give up yet? here. here's a big hint. The closest two guesses so far were jeb and squad.

Bob or Bill

Steve

Mojang

Redigit

He is someone you all know,

His talent he always shows.

He can print if he wants to,

but only in the color blue.

He was a christmas present from years ago,

Do not search for him, for his whereabouts nobody knows.

You all look up to him, to his authority,

Sorry for my riddle's lack of complexity.

Who is he?

hmm i feel that the print in the color blue is very important here...

how about uhh maybe a...

ok i got nothing but from what i can tell it is a toy that had a screen of some sorts and only used text that was colored blue...
It calls to mind something akin to an Etch-A-Sketch, but that doesn't do blue. Whatever it is, I don't think I've ever heard of it.
oh wait is a speak and spell?

None of those were it. Guys remember?

who is he?

Eurmm...

Harvester? Capt'n Skunky? vexx32? One of the moderators?
Starting to get the feeling we don't know this person, whoever it is.

vexx32?

YES!!!! finally. Explanation: most of it is in vexx's profile.

He is someone you all know,-he started the thread, hes a moderator

His talent he always shows.-he's awesome at riddles, as we all know

He can print if he wants to,

but only in the color blue.-hover over his reputation marker, it says he is allowed to draw blueprints

He was a christmas present from years ago,-look at his join date

Do not search for him, for his whereabouts nobody knows.-look at his location

You all look up to him, to his authority,-he's a moderator

Sorry for my riddle's lack of complexity.-just to make the rhyme

So you guys hate me or what?

Edited April 5, 2014 by Endersmens

YES!!!! finally. Explanation: most of it is in vexx's profile.

He is someone you all know,-he started the thread, hes a moderator

His talent he always shows.-he's awesome at riddles, as we all know

He can print if he wants to,

but only in the color blue.-hover over his reputation marker, it says he is allowed to draw blueprints

He was a christmas present from years ago,-look at his join date

Do not search for him, for his whereabouts nobody knows.-look at his location

You all look up to him, to his authority,-he's a moderator

Sorry for my riddle's lack of complexity.-just to make the rhyme

So you guys hate me or what?

... I would never think of that. I thought it's someone famous on worldwide scale!

Nice job, picking the one thing I never look at -- my avatar/signature.

(Now I might have to change colours just to spite you.)
DANG it was right in front of us the whole time

yeah if you guys hadn't got it i was gonna say the problem wasn't the vagueness or complexity of the riddle, but that the answer is in the one place you would never look. Mar90000000 got it on a lucky guess, so it's his turn to post a riddle.
There is a saying: "Hide it under his nose" Or something like that
